caption:
b'1 \xe2\x80\x93 2 \xe2\x80\x93 3 going up! :building_construction_selector:
 
There are typically two cranes on an offshore wind turbine. The crane in the picture is called the Davit crane and is placed on the service platform. The Davit crane has a max load just short of one tonne, and it helps the maintenance crew lift from the crew transfer vessel (CTV) to the service platform. The height from the CTV to the service platform varies between sites, but is approximately 15-35 metres depending on the tide. :water_wave:
 
The second crane on a wind turbine is placed inside the nacelle at the very top of the wind turbine. This is fittingly called the nacelle crane, and it can reach all the way down to the service platform, which is a distance ranging between 70 and 100 metres. :astonished_face:
 
#TechnicalTuesday #RenewableEnergy'

b'Ready for more green energy? :white_heavy_check_mark:
 
Please welcome Borssele 1 & 2, our first Dutch #offshore #windfarm, which is now fully commissioned. It\xe2\x80\x99s the second-largest operating offshore wind farm in the world, and it will supply renewable energy equivalent to the annual power consumption of one million Dutch households :house_with_garden:
 
We send virtual high fives to all teams involved :raising_hands:'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re paying a 17-year-old wind farm in Denmark an #instavisit :red_heart: 

Nysted Offshore Wind Farm is based off the coast of Lolland, an island in the southern part of Denmark :Denmark:, and was the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest offshore wind farm at the time of construction in 2003. 
The construction and especially the operation of the offshore wind farm made it a pioneer within the industry. The sheer size of the project posed a challenge for the operations team, who had to develop new maintenance concepts and procedures. 
To this day, the concepts of operations are still used on wind farm projects - which are only getting bigger and bigger! :star-struck:'

b'There\xe2\x80\x99s more to offshore wind than just wind turbines.\nAlthough wind turbines get a lot of attention when we talk about offshore wind, the substations are an equally important part of generating clean energy from the wind :wind_face:  The substations act as collection points for the #renewableenergy generated by the wind turbines surrounding them. The substations transform the electricity to a higher voltage, thus ensuring efficient operations when it\xe2\x80\x99s transported to onshore and fed into the power grid through an underground cable :electric_plug: :high_voltage:'

b':confetti_ball: Happy birthday, Formosa 1! :party_popper:\nIt\xe2\x80\x99s been one year since we inaugurated the first-ever commercial-scale offshore wind farm in Taiwan. Located 2-6 kilometres off the shore of Miaoli, the 128 MW offshore wind farm is able to generate enough clean energy to power 128,000 Taiwanese homes :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:'
b'Time for a challenge! :waving_hand:\nThree offshore wind farms \xe2\x80\x94 three different continents.\nWho can get all of them right? :star-struck::raising_hands:'

b'This floating offshore office is called Edda Passat \xe2\x80\xa6
 
\xe2\x80\xa6 and she\xe2\x80\x99s waiting for her next crew of #offshore colleagues :raising_hands:
A total of 32 technicians live and work onboard, servicing and maintaining the Race Bank Offshore Wind Farm in the UK in two-week shifts. Edda Passat is equipped with a gym, a canteen, a cinema room, and a recreational room for the technicians to enjoy once they\xe2\x80\x99re done working for the day :film_projector::person_lifting_weights_selector:

Photo: @mcliffe_ 

#renewables'

b'Anybody else who wishes for a wind turbine assembly set? :person_raising_hand:
It might look pretty simple at a glance, but it\xe2\x80\x99s definitely more complicated than the cupboard you assembled over the weekend :winking_face:Luckily, we have the best colleagues and partners to install our #onshore and offshore wind turbines! 
 
#renewables #windturbine'

b'Double #rainbow all the way across the sky! :rainbow:
The Summer season is over at Borkum Riffgrund 1 Offshore Wind Farm in Germany, but it isn\xe2\x80\x99t just bad news because now the rainbow season begins!
Have a wonderful weekend everyone :glowing_star: :glowing_star:
 
And thanks for the photo @julianalgon 
#renewableenergy #offshorewind'
b'\xe2\x80\x9cAlways keep your face towards the light- and shadows will fall behind you\xe2\x80\x9d\n#MondayMotivation #Renewables #Onshore #Wind'

b'Recently, our #offshore colleagues did a final inspection of a heli-hoist basket on one of the wind turbines in Borssele 1 & 2 in the Netherlands :Netherlands:
With help from the brand new H145 helicopter, operated by NHV, our colleagues could ensure the safety of any future maintenance crew.  A heli-hoist basket is the area with the red fence on top of the nacelle, and this is where the crew is hoisted down when checking operation and maintenance on our wind turbines :helicopter::construction_worker:
 
#safetyfirst #renewables #offshoreoffice'
b'As the fog clears up at Race Bank Offshore Wind Farm, UK.\nIsn\xe2\x80\x99t this just a truly magnificent sight? :star-struck:\nThanks for the picture @cour.tney'

b':musical_note: Row, row, row my wind turbine jacket foundation :musical_notes: :winking_face:
Throwback to a sunny day in the Easter of 2018 when these tree foundations were on their way from the factory in Poland :Poland: to their destination, Borkum Riffgrund 2, Germany :Germany:. The offshore wind farm uses a combination of monopile and jacket-type foundations, and the jacket foundations were installed with a so-called \xe2\x80\x98suction bucket\xe2\x80\x99. The construction of the wind farm took place from May to August in 2018 when it also supplied first power :flexed_biceps:
 
 
 
#tbt #renewables #offshorewind #windenergy'

b':ferry: Ship ahoy! It\xe2\x80\x99s the Wind of Hope. Our new service operation vessel :anchor:
The Wind of Hope is a state-of-the-art hybrid vessel with batteries installed to reduce fuel consumption. It\xe2\x80\x99s about to be finalised at Cemre Shipyard in Turkey for vessel owner @louisdreyfusarmateurs and will operate out of the Hornsea 2 Offshore Wind Farm, accommodating technicians who\xe2\x80\x99ll service and maintain the wind turbines. The wind farm is expected to be completed in 2022 :raising_hands:

The vessel is due to arrive at our East Coast operations and maintenance facility at the UK port of Grimsby next year. It\xe2\x80\x99s is a sister vessel to the Wind of Change which is servicing all our wind farms in the German North Sea.'

b'Let the wind blow at Willow. :wind_face:

We\xe2\x80\x99ve just completed Willow Creek Wind, a 103MW onshore wind farm located in Butte County, South Dakota, now ready to deliver clean energy to the US grid. :partying_face::star-struck:
We now have seven onshore wind farms in operation in the US. :flexed_biceps:
 
Thumbs up to the entire project team!'
b'Here\xe2\x80\x99s a little dose of #sunsets and #turbines! :sunset:\nName a more iconic duo :winking_face:\nThanks for sharing, @tiemon.vdw'
b'Bright and blue Borssele :Netherlands:\nCheck out this beautiful picture of our 94 newly installed wind turbines at Borssele 1 & 2 - located 23km off the coast of the Dutch province of Zeeland!'

b'The perfect puzzle :jigsaw:

Loading out an #offshore wind turbine is just like completing the perfect puzzle. Every component has to fit into the right place to meet the loading criteria and ensure safe transportation.
 
Enjoy this time-lapse from the Siemens Gamesa pre-assembly site at the harbour in Esbjerg, Denmark. The loading took place in August and lasted approximately 18 hours.'

b'Seen through the eyes of an #offshore technician :eyes:\nThe crew on our service operational vessel \xe2\x80\x98The Wind of Change\xe2\x80\x99 gets to experience the beauty of nature at sea when sailing out for weeks at a time to service our 231 wind turbines off the coast of northern Germany :Germany: \nPhoto: @julianalgon'

b'Seaside sunset at Svanem\xc3\xb8lle Heat Plant :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:

This beautiful building, located in the northern part of Copenhagen, is quite iconic to the locals. Initially, Svanem\xc3\xb8lle Heat Plant was built in 1953 to secure the supply of power and district heating in the Danish capital but has since then been repurposed several times to meet the changing market needs. Its age, history, and seaside location have made it into a landmark of the area, which is quite understandable considering how beautiful it is at sunset! :cityscape_at_dusk:
 
Photo: @_savannahsview_'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re ready to share another stunning #offshore view with you!\nThe wind turbine installation at Borssele 1 & 2 has been completed :raising_hands: The first wind turbine was installed in April 2020, and now, only five months later, all 94 wind turbines have been installed. Once fully commissioned later this year, the wind farm will be able to supply renewable energy equivalent to the annual power consumption of one million Dutch households. :house_with_garden: Amazing, right?'

b'Ever wondered how those huge blades are installed? :gear_selector::nut_and_bolt::thinking_face:
The installation vessel transports the blades to sea where the \xe2\x80\x98claw\xe2\x80\x99, a so-called blade yoke, with a weight of 82 tonnes is lifted by the vessel\xe2\x80\x99s crane, which provides the steadiness needed for the precision work of slotting the blade into place. 
The hub in front of the nacelle is adjusted and aligned with the blade, which is then inserted into the hub and fastened with bolts. 
The turbine\xe2\x80\x99s internal turn gear then rotates the hub 120 degrees for each of the following blades. 
This process takes around 20-30 minutes for each blade and voila\xcc\x80! :hugging_face:

Photo credit: @tiemon.vdw'

b'Goodbye coal! :waving_hand:\nWe\xe2\x80\x99ve just inaugurated our new sustainable wood chip-fired unit at Asn\xc3\xa6s Power Station in Kalundborg, Denmark. :partying_face: :party_popper:After more than three years\xe2\x80\x99 intensive work, the combined heat and power plant will now use sustainable biomass instead of coal, supplying green district heating to Kalundborg and green process heat to @novonordisk and @novozymes.'

b'Crystal blue skies, a gentle breeze, and the scent of nature \xe2\x80\x93 what more do you need? :relieved_face::leaf_fluttering_in_wind:\nSwipe through this #beautiful scenery of Sage Draw Wind in #Texas, US. :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:\n#renewableenergy'

b'Only 15 more to go! :glowing_star:\nAll foundations and cables for our Dutch Borssele 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm are now in place \xe2\x80\x93 and 79 of the wind turbines have been installed. :woman_construction_worker_selector: Once the wind farm is fully operational, its 94 wind turbines will be able to generate enough green energy to cover the electricity needs of one million Dutch homes. :raising_hands: photo: @matty086'

b'Twenty-two Taiwanese turbines in action! :flexed_biceps:\r\nFormosa 1 is the first commercial-scale offshore wind farm in Taiwan. With 20 Siemens Gamesa 6MW turbines and 2 Siemens Gamesa 4MW turbines, the 128MW wind farm can generate enough renewable energy to power 128,000 homes in Taiwan. How cool is that? :astonished_face:'

b'What a view! :star-struck:\nA gorgeous day at our Willow Creek Wind Farm, US, which is currently under construction.\nOnce fully operational, the project will generate enough clean energy to power approximately 40,000 US homes annually :raising_hands:'

b"Time to pay the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest offshore wind farm an #instavisit - Hornsea 1 Offshore Wind Farm, UK! :raising_hands:\nWith a capacity of 1.2 gigawatts (GW), Hornsea 1 was the world's first #offshorewind farm to exceed 1GW in capacity. :star-struck:With its 174 wind turbines it covers an area of approx. 407km2 off the Yorkshire coast.:wind_face:\nIt sure is amazing to think just how far offshore #wind has come! :astonished_face:"

b'Clip from a bicycle ride to Aved\xc3\xb8re Power Station. :woman_biking_selector:\nThe #powerstation is located south of Copenhagen, Denmark. :Denmark:\nThis means that you can see its iconic buildings from three perspectives \xe2\x80\x93 from land, sea, and air. :desert_island::water_wave::airplane_selector:'

b'Facing the wind! :wind_face:
 
Did you know that a #windturbine has a so-called yaw system which makes sure the rotor is facing the wind?:thinking_face:
 
And the yaw system has a couple of allies: a wind vane on top of the nacelle that constantly measures the wind direction and the turbine control system which is used to identify if the rotor is no longer perpendicular to the wind. :raising_hands: If it isn\xe2\x80\x99t, the yaw gears are used to turn the direction of the nacelle \xe2\x80\x93 and the rotor \xe2\x80\x93 into the wind for optimal power generation. :light_bulb::light_bulb:In other words, the yaw system is key in optimising the wind turbine\xe2\x80\x99s production. :clapping_hands:

:movie_camera:Video credit: @julianalgon'

b'Prepare to be amazed! :raising_hands:
\xe2\x80\x9cAmazed at what?\xe2\x80\x9d, you may ask. :thinking_face:
Wind turbines in a sunset, of course! :sunrise:
 
:camera: Photo by @julianalgon'

b"Plum Creek puzzle pieces \xe2\x80\xa6
\xe2\x80\xa6 have now all fallen neatly into place! :jigsaw::jigsaw::jigsaw::jigsaw:
We've now completed Plum Creek Wind in Nebraska, US.:partying_face:
This means that the #onshore wind farm\xe2\x80\x99s 82 #windturbines are now ready to #power 100,000 US homes annually. :house_with_garden:
The Plum Creek Wind project is our first project in Nebraska and brings our operational onshore capacity to 1.6GW. :light_bulb:
Swipe for full assembly! :beaming_face_with_smiling_eyes:"

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s a bit foggy out here, eh? :cloud_selector:\n\xe2\x80\xa6 But that doesn\xe2\x80\x99t prevent us from catching a glimpse of the wind turbines at Race Bank Offshore Wind Farm, UK.:eyes:\nAlthough you can\xe2\x80\x99t spot all of them in this photo, the wind farm actually counts 91 of them.:eye::smiling_face_with_sunglasses:'

b'The sun is counting down to the weekend, and so are we \xe2\x80\xa6 :sunrise: :tropical_drink:
What about you? 
Video credit: @julianalgon
#Fridayfeels #TGIF #Weekendfeels #Offshorewind'

b'Low-hanging clouds at Anholt. :fog_selector::cloud_selector: Time to go back to Denmark, the country where it all began. With its 111 turbines, Anholt Offshore Wind Farm has 10x more wind turbines than the world\xe2\x80\x99s first offshore wind farm, Vindeby, Denmark. 
And the capacity of just one of these wind turbines is equivalent to eight of the wind turbines at Vindeby. :astonished_face:

Photo Credit: Michael Rasmussen'

b'Onshore wind turbine or stair master? :winking_face: :man_lifting_weights_2:\nThe 110 GE 2.3MW wind turbines at Amazon Onshore Wind Farm, #Texas, stand more than 90 metres tall \xe2\x80\x93 with a rotor diameter of more than twice the wingspan of a Boeing 787. :woman_lifting_weights_medium_skin_tone:\nWith that many stairs to climb, every day must be leg day for our #windturbine technicians. :flexed_biceps::man_climbing_selector::zany_face: #onshorewind #renewableenergy #greenenergy #sustainablefuture'

b'Here\xe2\x80\x99s to another #offshore \xe2\x80\x98wow\xe2\x80\x99 view! :star-struck:\nThis time it\xe2\x80\x99s from the West of Duddon Sands Offshore Wind Farm in the UK. :sun_behind_small_cloud::sun_behind_cloud:\nThe wind farm\xe2\x80\x99s located in the East Irish Sea - close to our offshore #windfarms Walney 1 & 2 and Walney Extension.:houses: :camera:Photo credit: Ben Johnson'

b"Catching a ride home on Wind of Change! :man_raising_hand_selector: After a day's work on the wind turbines in Germany, our service operation vessel (SOV) Wind of Change picks up our wind technicians via a motion-compensated gangway. :ship::smiling_face_with_sunglasses: The gangway on a height-adjustable pedestal can be adjusted 0-5 metres up and down in order to place the gangway in the most favourable position in relation to the wind turbine. This allows the gangway to equalise tides and the access height difference between the foundations in the German cluster. :water_wave:

Photocredit: @julianalgon 
#renewableenergy #offshorewind"

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s time for a #rhyme to celebrate #globalwindday :raising_hands: :leaf_fluttering_in_wind: 
It\xe2\x80\x99s break time at the offshore wind farm
Mugs are being filled with coffee
A tad of milk or maybe tea instead
And paired with a nice piece of toffee 
Onto the deck: come on, let\xe2\x80\x99s go! 
They\xe2\x80\x99re clearly on a mission
To enjoy a brief moment of serenity at sea
It\xe2\x80\x99s the life of a wind turbine technician :woman_mechanic::man_mechanic:'

b':musical_notes:Somewhere over... wait a minute... :face_with_monocle:
Under the rainbow? Inside maybe? :thinking_face:
Well regardless, this photo is awesome. :star-struck:Thanks for sharing @julianalgon 
#Rainbow #greenenergy #offshorewind #renewables #windfarm'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to be showcasing the beauty of 1,500 offshore wind turbines! :partying_face::smiling_face_with_sunglasses:
Since 1991, we\xe2\x80\x99ve installed 1,500 offshore wind turbines. :white_heavy_check_mark:
We\xe2\x80\x99ve also set out to more than double our offshore wind capacity in the coming five years, using ever larger wind turbines. :face_screaming_in_fear::star-struck: Just check out how much the capacity of a single offshore wind turbine has increased: 
1: 0.45MW
500: 3.6MW
1,000: 6MW
1,500: 8MW
 #RenewableEnergy #ActOnClimate'

b'Permian Energy Center is well underway! :hugging_face:\n\nThe Texas-based energy center will become our first utility-scale solar-plus-storage project. Once completed in 2021, it\xe2\x80\x99ll generate enough green electricity to power approx 100,000 US homes and consist of 1.3 million solar panels :astonished_face:'

b'On this #WorldOceansDay, we celebrate the beauty of the ocean and all the amazing sea creatures you get to see when working offshore! :water_wave::smiling_face_with_heart-eyes: Last year, our crew captured this video of a minke whale at the Hornsea 1 Offshore Wind Farm :spouting_whale:'

b'The sun always shines above the clouds. :sun_behind_small_cloud::sun_behind_cloud:
So do our #windturbines, so to speak. Well, that\xe2\x80\x99s where they generate clean energy. :flexed_biceps:
Pictured here is Westermost Rough #Offshore Wind Farm, UK. :bright_button:
With its 35 wind turbines and a total capacity of 210MW, this wind farm can provide enough #cleanenergy to power over 180,000 UK homes annually. :houses: Photo taken by @georgeacherrell :camera_with_flash:'

b'Where\xe2\x80\x99s the wind turbine technician? :woman_detective_selector:\nAt first glance, it might not be obvious, but in fact, you can spot one our colleagues climbing a wind turbine blade at Gode Wind 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm. With a rotor diameter of 154m, it\xe2\x80\x99s no surprise that a wind turbine technician climbing a blade may be hard to spot. :astonished_face:'

b'Check out these cool shots of the new #helicopter ready to service the #offshore wind farm Borssele 1 & 2 in the Netherlands. :smiling_face_with_sunglasses::helicopter: The helicopter will be used to transfer technicians when we do maintenance of the #windturbines during rough weather. @nhvgroup #flyingintotheweekendlike'

b'A first for the US!:clapping_hands:\nThe foundations are now ready for the Coastal Virginia offshore wind turbines to be installed. :hammer_and_pick::hammer_and_wrench:They\xe2\x80\x99ll be the very first turbines in US federal waters. :water_wave:\nWith our partner @dominionenergy we\xe2\x80\x99re building a 12MW offshore wind pilot project 27 miles off the coast of Virginia Beach. :beach_with_umbrella:When completed, it will become the first offshore wind project in the US Mid-Atlantic \xe2\x80\x93 and the second in the country. :star-struck::partying_face:'

b'Did you know that \xe2\x80\xa6 :light_bulb:
At \xc3\x98rsted, one of our favourite things is the combination of sunsets and wind turbines. :drooling_face:
Just go ahead and admit it \xe2\x80\x93 it\xe2\x80\x99s your favourite too! :winking_face:
Photo credit: Christian Rueskov Holm'

b'Offshore office vol. 2: :anchor:
Sneak a peek inside one of the cabins of our offshore crews. :woman_construction_worker_medium-light_skin_tone::construction_worker:
Our colleagues operating and maintaining our offshore wind farms live and work offshore in shifts. :ship: Imagine a job and accommodation with an ocean view! :sunrise:
#offshorecrew  #Offshoreoffice'

b'A glimpse back in time when Gode Wind 1 & 2 were under construction in 2016.:hammer_and_pick::hammer_and_wrench::gear_selector:\nWith a combined capacity of 582MW, these projects were important contributions to meeting the German government\xe2\x80\x99s target of reaching a total capacity of 6.5GW offshore #windpower by 2020. The two #windfarms generate enough #power to supply approx. 600,000 German homes :flexed_biceps::houses:'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re one step closer to bringing offshore wind to the state of Virginia in the US! :United_States: Last week, we completed the cable pull-in, which is the first big step in delivering renewable energy to Virginia\xe2\x80\x99s power grid through our Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind pilot project. :electric_plug: \nWith our partner @dominionenergy, we\xe2\x80\x99re developing a 12MW offshore wind project off the coast of Virginia Beach. :beach_with_umbrella_selector: Once complete, it will become the first offshore wind project in the US Mid-Atlantic \xe2\x80\x93 and the second in the country. :raising_hands::raising_hands:'

b'Work is only a brief walk away! :woman_walking_selector::person_walking: Our colleagues at Hornsea 1 Offshore Wind Farm, UK, can access the wind turbines from the service operation vessel (SOV) via a motion-compensated gangway. :bridge_at_night::ferry_selector: So it\xe2\x80\x99s just a matter of minutes for them to make their way from their cabins to their #offshoreoffice'

b"Flashback to 2017 when Burbo Bank Extension in the UK was constructed. It was the first #offshorewind farm ever to install a 8MW wind turbine. Just one of these wind turbines produces more energy than the whole of Vindeby, the world's first offshore wind farm built in 1991 :astonished_face::astonished_face::astonished_face:\n#ThrowbackThursday"

b'Here are a few of the amazing photos taken offshore recently by our colleagues. :star-struck::clapping_hands::OK_hand_medium-light_skin_tone:We can\xe2\x80\x99t decide which one we like the most. What\xe2\x80\x99s your favorite? 1, 2 or 3? :thinking_face:'

b'#Throwbackthursday
Low-slung jeans, fedoras and cargo pants \xe2\x80\xa6 Remember 2003?
Besides these memorable fashion trends, 2003 was also the year the first wind turbine was installed at Nysted Offshore Wind Farm, Denmark. About 300 people were involved in the construction of the wind farm consisting of 72 wind turbines with a total capacity of 165.6MW. :astonished_face: 
#nostalgia'

b'Step by step, the sun\xe2\x80\x99s setting \xe2\x80\xa6 :sunset:
\xe2\x80\xa6 At our Walney Extension Offshore Wind Farm, UK.

The wind farm covers an area of 145km2 in the Irish Sea.
It\xe2\x80\x99s the first commercial offshore wind project in the world to use the Siemens 7MW wind turbine. 
Photo credit: @greggparsons13 
#OffshoreWind #Renewables'

b'Stunning scenery around Aved\xc3\xb8re Power Station, Denmark. :leaf_fluttering_in_wind:
Did you know that in the design of its two units, primary focus was  on matching the buildings to the flat, dammed area around K\xc3\xb8ge Bay? 
Aved\xc3\xb8re Power Station is one of several power stations 
in \xc3\x98rsted which supplies both heat and power to the Danes. :light_bulb: 
Photo credit: @storefar'

b'Big things are happening at Permian Energy Center, our first utility-scale solar and battery storage project :grinning_face_with_big_eyes: This week, the first solar panels arrived on site marking a major milestone for the 460MW project in Texas with expected completion in 2021 :partying_face: #renewables #greenenergy #cleanenergy'

b'First power flows from Borssele 1 & 2! :raising_hands:\nThe first wind turbine at the Borssele 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm is now delivering electricity to the Dutch grid. :light_bulb: \nOnce completed, the wind farm will consist of 94 Siemens Gamesa 8MW wind turbines; making it the largest offshore wind farm in the Netherlands. :Netherlands:'

b'On the way across the Atlantic. :ship::anchor::water_wave: @siemensgamesa turbine components and monopiles for the Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind pilot project have started their journey to North America. :globe_showing_Americas: \nWith our partner @dominionenergy, we\xe2\x80\x99re developing a 12MW offshore wind project off the coast of Virginia Beach.:umbrella_on_ground: Once complete, it will become the first offshore wind project in the US Mid-Atlantic \xe2\x80\x93 and the second in the country. :star-struck: @jandenulgroup'

b'3 \xe2\x80\xa6 2 \xe2\x80\xa6 1 \xe2\x80\xa6 lift-off! :rocket: Hold tight and get ready to see your home like never before :eyes: It\xe2\x80\x99s beautiful - even from outer space :dizzy: To take care of our shared home, we all need to act now :folded_hands: \n#EarthDay2020 #vrspacesafari'

b'Climbing high in Taiwan. :man_climbing_medium_skin_tone: Our Formosa 1 Offshore Wind Farm has two phases: :backhand_index_pointing_right: Phase :keycap_1:, comprising two Siemens Gamesa 4MW wind turbines.
:backhand_index_pointing_right:Phase :keycap_2:, comprising twenty Siemens Gamesa 6MW wind turbines.

In total, that\xe2\x80\x99s 22 wind turbines for our Formosa 1 teams to operate and maintain. :flexed_biceps_light_skin_tone::flexed_biceps_light_skin_tone: The wind turbines can power around 128,000 Taiwanese #households in total. :houses:'

b'5 wind turbines, 7 photos \xe2\x80\x93 swipe for full assembly! :wrench::nut_and_bolt::flexed_biceps_light_skin_tone:\nBlock Island Wind Farm, off the coast of Rhode Island, is our first US #offshorewind farm. It\xe2\x80\x99s also the first and currently only offshore wind farm of its kind in the #US. It became operational back in December 2016 and can generate enough energy to #power 17,000 homes! :houses:\n#throwbacktime :partying_face:'

b'It doesn\xe2\x80\x99t look like much yet, but next year, this field will turn into Permian Energy Center, a solar PV and storage facility in Texas, US. :sun_with_face::sun_selector: The energy center is located on a site spanning almost 15 km2 and will generate enough green electricity to power approx 100,000 US homes. :houses:Currently, the site is being prepared for the installation of racking, 1.3 million solar panels, and a 40MWh battery system. :battery:'

b':keycap_1: down, :keycap_9::keycap_3: wind turbines to go! :party_popper:
The first 8MW #windturbine has now been installed at our Borssele Offshore Wind Farm in the #Netherlands. :flexed_biceps_light_skin_tone:
The wind farm is located approximately 22km off the coast of the Zeeland province.
#workinprogress'

b'Ahoy! First wind turbines off to Borssele Offshore Wind Farm! :person_raising_hand:\n\nTurbines for Borssele 1 & 2 are now crossing the North Sea and will soon arrive at the Borssele site, ready to be installed next week. Once complete, the offshore wind farm will be able to provide green energy for one million Dutch homes :hugging_face: #offshorewind'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve completed Sage Draw Wind, a 338MW wind farm in Texas, US! Thanks to all of our committed colleagues involved in the project, the wind farm was delivered on time and on budget :raising_hands::smiling_face_with_smiling_eyes:'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s time to pay our German wind farms an #instavisit!:seedling:\nCurrently, we have four offshore wind farms in operation in Germany \xe2\x80\x93 and we have another two wind farms with a total capacity of 1,142MW in development. :light_bulb: The wind farms generate green energy for around 1.4 million German homes annually. :houses:\nPhoto credit: @hortus_palinka'
b'From here, there\xe2\x80\x99s nothing but wind turbines and horizon. :sunrise: Photo credit: @hortus_palinka'

b'#Throwbacktime to January \xe2\x80\x93 and to our daughter vessel Passat Worker being ready for service! :flexed_biceps:
Passat Worker is used offshore to transport technicians from its mothership, the SOV Edda Passat, to the wind turbines for corrective maintenance. :woman_mechanic::man_mechanic: In these cases, it may be quicker to transport technicians via a smaller vessel to be able to service the #windturbines ASAP. :ferry_selector: :ship:
The craft has room for 8 technicians and 2 crew members. 
Our colleague @stocks_field_photography caught a video of the Passat Worker being launched from the Edda Passat and into the water. :clapping_hands:'

b'Meet Erik J\xc3\xb8rgensen, wind technician at Anholt Offshore Wind Farm in Denmark. He\xe2\x80\x99s one of the colleagues who still goes on site to keep our operating assets running despite the difficult times we\xe2\x80\x99re all in right now :flexed_biceps: Thanks to them, we can still deliver green energy to millions of homes around the world. This might be more important than ever before :folded_hands::folded_hands::folded_hands:'

b'Big #blades at Borkum. :leaf_fluttering_in_wind: 
Borkum Riffgrund 1 Offshore Wind Farm in Germany counts 78 Siemens 4.0MW wind turbines, each with a rotor diameter of 120m. :straight_ruler: 
With blades stretching 58.5m long, the total swept area of the #wind #turbines amounts to 11,300m2! :astonished_face: 
The wind farm is located 37km off the German island of #Borkum. :Germany:'

b'Caption this! :sunrise:\r\nOne of our colleagues took this stunning snapshot of Hornsea 1 #Offshore Wind Farm, UK. :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:\r\nHow would you caption it? Let us know in the comments below. :backhand_index_pointing_down: Photo: @davecoussens :clapping_hands:'

b'Sun glitter at Westermost Rough Offshore Wind Farm. :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:
Fun facts! :backhand_index_pointing_right: Westermost Rough was \xc3\x98rsted\xe2\x80\x99s first offshore wind farm construction in the Humber, UK. :United_Kingdom:
:backhand_index_pointing_right: It was also \xc3\x98rsted\xe2\x80\x99s first UK wind farm to use helicopter operations to ease operations. :helicopter:
Photo credit: @georgeacherrell'

b'On this International #womensday, we celebrate all the talented women working in the #renewable industry helping to make the world a greener place! :clapping_hands::red_heart_selector: #orstedmoment'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve selected Siemens Gamesa as the preferred #windturbine supplier for our projects Borkum Riffgrund 3 and Gode Wind 3. :leaf_fluttering_in_wind:\nThe two #offshore wind farms located in the German North Sea have a total capacity of 1.1GW. :light_bulb::light_bulb:\nBoth offshore #windfarms will use the new 11MW wind turbine with a rotor spanning 200 metres. :sun_with_face:'

b'Aerial view of H.C. \xc3\x98rsted Power Station, Denmark. :bird::baby_chick:\nThe photo was captured by one of our colleagues during the inspection of one of the power station\xe2\x80\x99s chimneys. :man_detective_light_skin_tone:\nDid you know that the power station supplies power and heat to respectively 12,000 and 25,000 Copenhagen homes? :houses::light_bulb::thermometer: #greenenergy #loveyourhome #aworldrunningentirelyongreenenergy'

b'Siblings in the Irish Sea? :family_woman_woman_boy_boy: Walney Extension Offshore Wind Farm, UK, came into commercial operation in 2018. \nAs its name suggests, the wind farm is an extension of our Walney 1 and 2 #Offshore Wind Farm, \nwhich came into commercial operation in 2012. The #windfarms are located directly next to each other in the Irish Sea. :water_wave:'

b'Radiant Race Bank :sparkles:
The UK #windfarm covers an area of 75km2 and is located 17km off the UK coast in the North Sea.:water_wave:
With this location, it has our Lincs Offshore Wind Farm as a neighbour! :houses:
Race Bank has 91 #windturbines which are able to generate enough electricity to #power over 500,000 UK homes annually. Photo credit: @h_melvaer :clapping_hands:'

b'Fits like a glove. :flexed_biceps: \n#Throwback to the construction of our Block Island Offshore Wind Farm, US. :hammer::hammer_and_pick_selector: The wind farm powers all of Block Island, which is located off the coast of Rhode Island.:desert_island_selector: That\xe2\x80\x99s five #windturbines generating enough clean energy to power 17,000 US homes! :house:'

b':sun_selector::sun_with_face:For all of you waiting in awe for rays of spring sunshine:\nHere\xe2\x80\x99s a preview from Gunfleet Sands Offshore Wind Farm, UK. #springmood :seedling::hibiscus::tulip:'

b'Installation status from the Netherlands! :partying_face:
Installation completed for 19 of 94 #foundations for the Borssele 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm!:check_mark::check_mark:
The wind farm will be located about 22km off the coast of the Zeeland province and will be our first offshore wind farm in the Netherlands. Find more pics on @orstednl :clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
Photo credit: @demegroup'

b'The wind\xe2\x80\x99s also blowing onshore. :winking_face: \nIt\xe2\x80\x99s our ambition to have an installed capacity of 5GW onshore wind and solar energy in the US by 2025. :sun_selector::leaf_fluttering_in_wind: Currently, we\xe2\x80\x99re operating a total of 1GW \xe2\x80\x93 and have 1GW more under construction across the states of Texas, Nebraska and South Dakota. :flexed_biceps: \nWant to read more about our onshore projects? Link in bio! :folded_hands:'

b'#throwbacktuesday to the summer of 2018 when Borkum Riffgrund 2 in Germany was under construction :sun_selector::construction_worker: With a total capacity of 450MW, it can power nearly half a million German homes. :light_bulb::houses::house_with_garden:'

b'Perfect rainbow over Westermost Rough Offshore Wind Farm, UK.:rainbow:The wind farm is operated and maintained from our East Coast Hub in Grimsby. :woman_mechanic::man_mechanic: More than 900 people were involved in the construction phase :astonished_face: \nThanks to our colleague @danmc17 for sharing!'

b'Supplying 128,000 households with green energy. :light_bulb:\nLast year, we inaugurated our Formosa 1 Offshore Wind Farm in #Taiwan. :partying_face:\nWith its 22 wind turbines, it\xe2\x80\x99s our first Taiwanese #offshore #windfarm. :clapping_hands::clapping_hands:'
b'This amazing photo of Walney Extension Offshore Wind Farm, UK almost looks like a painting :artist_palette::woman_artist:'

b'Ship ahoy! It\xe2\x80\x99s the Wind of Change! :ferry_selector: Wind of Change, our service operation vessel (SOV), spotted \xe2\x80\x98in action\xe2\x80\x99 by one of our colleagues at our Gode Wind 1 & 2 offshore wind farms, Germany. :smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:\r\nThe SOV services all of our wind farms located in the German North Sea. :water_wave: #sailingintotheweekendlike'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s a bird! It\xe2\x80\x99s a plane! It\xe2\x80\x99s a \xe2\x80\xa6 Siemens 4.0MW offshore wind turbine! :astonished_face::winking_face:\nLocation: Borkum Riffgrund 1 Offshore Wind Farm, Germany. :raising_hands: #offshorewind'
b'Last week\xe2\x80\x99s skyline at our Walney offshore wind farms, UK. :sunrise:\nThe stunning view was captured by one of our colleagues working #offshore. :clapping_hands:'

b':llama: We can\xe2\x80\x99t quite figure out whether this lurking llama  is just being mindful \xe2\x80\x93 or whether it\xe2\x80\x99s enjoying the view of Aved\xc3\xb8re Power Station, Denmark,  in the distance :winking_face::llama: The station delivers heat and power  to 200,000 and 600,000  households, respectively, in the Greater Copenhagen area. :light_bulb: \nPhoto credit: @evanbirkebaek'

b'Idyllic, eh? :beaming_face_with_smiling_eyes::smiling_cat_face_with_heart-eyes:\nWestermost Rough Offshore Wind Farm in the UK sure is easy on the eyes. :raising_hands:\nThanks for sharing @tomatkin_'

b'The nacelle: the heart of the wind turbine. :green_heart:
A wind turbine\xe2\x80\x99s #nacelle is placed on the top of its tower and houses the drive train and key #energy-generating components, the hydraulic system, and the emergency brake. :flexed_biceps:
In the nacelle, the energy of the rotating blades is converted into generator rotations producing electric power in the generator. :light_bulb:
This shot features one of the 4MW Siemens #turbines at the offshore wind farm Borkum Riffgrund 1 in Germany. Its tower carries a nacelle weighing an astounding 190 tonnes! :astonished_face::balance_scale_selector:'

b'Stuff from the photo stash :winking_face: 
We dug out this photo from August 2015, showcasing the construction of our Gode #Wind 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm in Germany. :dashing_away:
The last of the wind farm\xe2\x80\x99s 97 #windturbines was installed in May 2016. 
#throwback'

b'Amazing airplane window view!:airplane_selector:
Our London Array Offshore Wind Farm is situated 20km off the east coast of Britain in the outer Thames Estuary. :water_wave:
From this location, it may occasionally greet London-bound flight passengers from below. :star-struck:
Just take a look at how tiny the #wind farm\xe2\x80\x99s 175 wind turbines look from an airplane window!:clapping_hands:
From this angle, it\xe2\x80\x99s hard to imagine that it actually covers a total area of 100km2. :face_screaming_in_fear:
Photo credit: @jonny_penn'

b'\xc3\x98rsted has been ranked the world\xe2\x80\x99s most #sustainable company in Corporate Knights\xe2\x80\x99 Global 100 index!! :raising_hands::partying_face:\nWe\xe2\x80\x99re proud to be #1, and we urge countries and companies to take active, ambitious steps to reduce their carbon emissions. :green_heart: [link in bio]'
b'Wind turbines caught between the sky and the sea. :cloud_selector::water_wave:\nLocation: Hornsea 1 Offshore Wind Farm, UK. :star-struck:\nThanks for sharing @davecoussens'

b'Cold fact! :wind_face:
It may be cold and dark in Europe these months, but did you know that offshore wind farms provide more power in cold air than in hot air? :light_bulb:
When the wind is cold, the air becomes denser which adds more energy to the #windturbines, making them rotate a bit faster. :flexed_biceps:
Photo credit: Bladt Industries.'

b'New green milestone in the Netherlands! :partying_face:

We\xe2\x80\x99ve started constructing Borssele 1 & 2 Offshore Wind Farm. The 752MW wind farm will count 94 wind turbines of 8MW. Once completed, it\xe2\x80\x99ll be the largest offshore wind farm in the Netherlands and will be able to generate enough green electricity to power around one million homes :star-struck::raising_hands:
#offshorewind #greenenergy'

b'The lights of the Svanem\xc3\xb8lle Heat Plant and its surroundings reflected in Svanem\xc3\xb8lle Bay, Copenhagen, Denmark. :light_bulb::light_bulb::light_bulb: The heat plant delivers district heating to about 6,000 Copenhagen households. :thermometer_selector: Photo credit: @mr.harisdk'

b'What are the lights on top of a wind turbine? :light_bulb::thinking_face:
The aviation lights placed on the wind turbine\xe2\x80\x99s nacelle warn aircrafts about the location of the wind turbine at night. :milky_way:
You can see the lights from all angles of the wind turbine. They\xe2\x80\x99re so-called smart lights, as they adjust their intensity to the weather conditions. :flexed_biceps: In poor visibility, the light intensity will be increased, and conversely, the intensity will automatically decrease in good visibility. :glasses:
The photo displays a night with clear weather at the Race Bank offshore wind farm with the stars and the moon lighting up the sky, thus assisting the aviation lights. :last_quarter_moon_face::white_medium_star:
Photo credit: @h_melvaer'

b"Eliminating up to 8,000 #plastic bottles per trip at sea! :ferry::ferry:
Our crews and technicians who live and work offshore to maintain our German #offshore wind farms can now quench their thirst without single-use plastic water bottles. :man_mechanic_light_skin_tone:
That\xe2\x80\x99s because our service operation vessel 'Wind of Change' uses a custom-built filtering system that turns sea water into drinking water. :water_wave::right_arrow_selector::potable_water:
The system is powered by the vessel\xe2\x80\x99s hybrid electric-diesel engine and ensures a daily production of up to 40 cubic metres of drinking water from North Sea sea water. :star-struck: Photo credit: Nicolas Job. #takegreenaction"

b'Time for a little trip back #onshore. :winking_face:\r\nLet\xe2\x80\x99s pay a visit to our 253MW Amazon Wind Farm in Texas, US. :cactus::cactus: The wind farm counts 110 wind turbines, which generate more than 1 million MWh of #cleanenergy to the grid each year. All in all, that\xe2\x80\x99s enough energy to power around 90,000 US homes annually. Just awesome! :face_with_open_mouth::smiling_face_with_heart-eyes:'
